message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this incredible opportunity to acquire a unique product. I believe it has the potential to revolutionize your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1500000. Is this something you'd like to consider?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid $900000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we discuss $1200000?
I'm still very interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $1000000. Can you meet me at $1000000?
Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1000000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a decent profit. How about we meet at $1150000?
I'm starting to think that I'm not getting a good deal here. I'm willing to meet you at $1050000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can you meet me there?

Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1050000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm fairly compensated. How about we meet at $1100000?
I'm starting to think that we're not going to come to an agreement at this price. I'm willing to meet you at $1050000, but I'm not willing to go any higher. Can you reconsider your price?

Bob, I'm starting to think we're not going to see eye-to-eye on the price. I'm willing to make one final concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing out on a good deal. How about we meet at $1080000?
